title: Client / server mismatch error
body: I started my first promo game and just as it was about to go to the loading screen, I get the error that there is a client / server mismatch. Not sure what to do

replies.body: Are you on the updated client?  It sounds that either the patch update or updating the client might not have installed properly.  If you are on the updated client, a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)may be necessary.  Let me know if you have any questions!
